792073 THE RUBBER ACT, 1947
ACT NO. 24 OF 1947 [ 18th April, 1947.]
An Act to provide for the development 1 under the control of the Union] of the rubber industry 2.
WHEREAS it is expedient to provide for the development 1 under the control of the Union] of the rubber industry 2;
It is hereby enacted as follows:--
797295 1 Short title and extent.
407208 1This Act may be called the Rubber 3 Act, 1947.
886949 2It extends to the whole of India 4 except the State of Jammu and Kashmir].
637802 25 Declaration as to expediency of Union control. It is hereby declared that it is expedient in the public interest that the Union should take under its control the rubber industry.]
969442 3 Definitions. In this Act, unless there is anything repugnant in the subject or context,--
1079327 a" Board" means the 6 Rubber Board constituted under this Act;
43704 b" dealer" means any person who deals in rubber, whether wholesale or retail, or holds stocks of rubber, and in- cludes the representative or agent of a dealer;
1681533 c" estate" means any area administered as one unit which contains land planted with rubber plants;
228271 d" export" and" import" mean respectively taking out of, and bringing into, 7 India] by sea, land or air;
797220 dd8" India" means the territory of India excluding the State of Jammu and Kashmir;]
603024 e" manufacturer" means any person engaged in the manufacture of any article in the making of which rubber is used; 52 999999 The Act comes into force in Pondicherry on 1. 10. 1963 vide Reg. 7 of 1963, s. 3 and Sch. I.
Extended to, and brought into force in Dadra and Nagar Havoli (w. e. f. 1. 7. 65) by Reg. 6 of 1963, s. 2 and Sch. I.

323966 g" prescribed" means prescribed by rules made under this Act;
1736001 h" rubber" means--
132160 icrude rubber, that is to say, rubber prepared from the leaves, bark or latex of any rubber plant;
58471 iithe latex of any rubber plant, whether fluid or coagulated, in any stage of the treatment to which it is subjected during the process of conversion into rubber;
990285 iiilatex (dry rubber content) in any state of concentration, and includes scrap rubber, sheet rubber, rubber in powder and all forms and varieties of crepe rubber, but does not include rubber contained in any manufactured article;

58471 iiManihot Glaziovii (Ceara Rubber),
990285 iiiCastilloa elastica,
21796 ivFicus elastica (Rambong), and
1488138 vany other plant which the Board may, by notification in the Gazette of India, declare to be a rubber plant for the purposes of this Act;
114598 j" Rubber Production Commissioner" means the Rubber Production Commissioner appointed under this Act;
798217 k1" small grower" means an owner whose estate does not exceed fifty acres in area.]

1617669 2The Board shall be a body corporate by the name of the 2 Rubber Board having perpetual succession and a common seal, with power to acquire and hold property, both movable and immovable, and to contract, and shall by the said name sue and be sued.
637398 33 The Board shall consist of--

878032 ceight members to represent the State of Kerala, six of whom shall be persons representing the rubber producing interests, three of such six being persons representing the small growers;]
1277254 dten members to be nominated by the Central Government, of whom two shall represent the manufacturers and four labour;
849707 ethree members of Parliament of whom two shall be elected by the House of the People and one by the Council of States; and
1506316 fthe Rubber Production Commissioner, ex officio.

634374 5Any officer of the Central Government when deputed by that Government in this behalf shall have the right to attend the meetings of the Board and take part in the proceedings thereof but shall not be entitled to vote.

7440 7The members of the Board shall receive from the Board such allowances as may be prescribed.
391502 8It is hereby declared that the office of member of the Board shall not disqualify its holder for being chosen as, or for being, a member of either House of Parliament.]
